DataElement.preferredName: Electronic Cigarette Or Personal Vaporizer Current Day Per Week Temporal Frequency Use Smoking Year Number

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Electronic Cigarette Or Personal Vaporizer Current Day Per Week Temporal Frequency Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A battery-powered atomizer designed to aerosolize a liquid solution for inhalation._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._For each, generally denoting a ratio._Any period of seven consecutive days._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period._To put into action or service.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A battery-powered atomizer designed to aerosolize a liquid solution for inhalation.

Concepts.definition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

Property.preferredName: Current Day Per Week Temporal Frequency Use
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:For each, generally denoting a ratio.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.:To put into action or service.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
To put into action or service.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the number of years a patient has smoked cigarettes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
